name.baseName: Electricity/electrical energy + heat energy ; Coal gangue/oil shale ; Circulating fluidized bed boiler ; All sizes; NESPS2
电能/电能+热能 ; 煤矸石/油页岩 ; 循环流化床锅炉 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isHigh-efficiency electrostatic precipitation①，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0.0028Sar+99.975

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isHigh-efficiency electrostatic precipitation①，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0.0028Sar+99.975
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及利用煤矸石和油页岩在所有规模的电厂共同产生电力和热能的循环流化床锅炉。尾气处理的污染管理技术范围从废水处理技术（比如直排、重用和利用）到先进的空气污染控制系统，包括用于处理颗粒物的各种除尘器和洗涤器，以及用于从排气中去除二氧化硫、氮氧化物和汞的技术。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4411、4412文件，在完整版文件中第5333页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isHigh-efficiency bag filter + others (wet desulfurization synergy) + others (wet electrostatic precipitator)①，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100

污染物指标颗粒物（无炉内脱硫）的末端治理技术是高效袋式除尘+其他（湿法脱硫协同）+其他（湿式电除尘）①，其效率为100，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为除尘设施年实际运行小时数/机组年实际运行小时数，①高效颗粒物末端治理技术：采取高效电源供电、低低温电除尘、超净电袋、高效袋式除尘、湿法脱硫协同、湿式电除尘等技术，满足《燃煤电厂超低排放烟气 治理工程技术规范》（HJ2053-2246）相关要求。 。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物（无炉内脱硫），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物（无炉内脱硫）
